title: Walk In Closets! Steps from Starbucks & More! 10 Weeks Free + $1500
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 511 Sq.
Sophisticated apartment living is arriving at the intersection of Broadway and Piedmont.
Studio, one and two bedroom spaces feature unmatched amenities never before seen in Oakland.
With the genuine fixtures and modern finishes, you’ll love the stylish comfort of staying right at home.

USB outlets, Stainless Steel Appliances (Gas Range), High Speed Internet & Cable Ready, Sleek Finishes w/Quartz Counter-top, Central AC/Heating in all units, Equipped Kitchens, Garbage Disposal, Brand New Apartments, Carpet & Wood Style Floors, Double Pane Windows, Walk-In Closets*, Key-less front door entry, Patio/Balcony*

Fitness Center, Package Lockers, Car Charging Station, Resident Clubhouse, Luxury Living, Door to Door Trash Pick-Up (Valet Living), Maintenance Emergency 24/7, Onsite Management 7 days, Courtyard w/ BBQs, Pet Spa, Swimming Pool & Spa, Rooftop Lounge, Courtesy Patrol, Brand New Building, Dog Run, Hammock Park, Onsite Storage, Outdoor Fireplaces, Laundry Lockers, Yoga Studio, Bocce Ball Court, Bike Storage, Controlled Access Building
We are a pet friendly community.
However, we do have breed restrictions.
Please check with leasing team for further details.
Must earn (gross household income) 2.5 times amount of rent
